entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. A few rain showers beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then clearing. Fog patches overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High 11.
